long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quietalk is a simple application that allows you to show your words rather than say them.
Usage opportunities abound in either very noisy or very quiet environments where visually communication can often be easier/more socially acceptable than verbal communication.

Common Usage Situations:
-in a lecture hall or classroom
-in a meeting
-in a library
-tell someone on the phone something without interrupting their conversation
-talk to someone not immediately next to you in a loud or quiet environment (train, airplane, etc.)
-allow someone who is otherwise unable to verbally communicate to efficiently convey their message

Have another usage case that isn't on this list? Please let us know, we would love to hear from you!

feedback@quietalk.com
